name: Agonyaunt
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wise advice
des:
Do you know these moments? When you have these small, often unrealistic doubts, and want to ask someone for affirmation? Agony aunt provides light-hearted advice and encouragement. 

Things that you can ask:
- "How do I look in this outfit?"
- "Should I dye my hair? "
- "Do these jeans make me fat?"
- "Can I do this job?"
- "My boyfriend and I are in a fight. Who's right?"
- "I don't think I'm good enough for my job"
- "How can I stop being a perfectionist?"
- "My boss doesn't appreciate me"

Auntie learns new questions everyday, so make sure to come back every once in a while.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
